Game.Name: Bleach- Dark Souls
Game.Plot: Fight on the side of good or evil! BLEACH: Dark Souls is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Nintendo DS fighting title BLEACH: The Blade of Fate. Dark Souls offers a total of 44 characters - the largest BLEACH video game roster to date. The Wi-Fi battle system was improved for BLEACH: Dark Souls and allows players to hold online battle events and create team-based matches.
